a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of new armed conflicts, World

Included are
interstate
,
intrastate
,
extrasystemic
,
non-state
conflicts, and
one-sided violence
that started that
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program (2025)
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions, and do not necessarily start at the same time across them. The sum across all regions can
therefore be higher than the global number.
